weekly_top_story.headline: Worldwide protests demand stronger action after Israel intercepts humanitarian aid flotilla to Gaza
weekly_top_story.summary: Global demonstrations erupted across Europe, Australia, and South America condemning Israel's interception of 41 aid ships bound for Gaza, underscoring international concern for humanitarian access amid ongoing conflict.

stories.headline: Pentagon releases video showing U.S. strike on suspected drug smuggling boat off Venezuela
stories.summary: The U.S. Pentagon shared new footage of a deadly military strike on an alleged drug-running vessel near Venezuela, marking the fourth such known U.S. attack within a month, signaling intensifying efforts against drug trafficking in the region.

stories.headline: Japan seeks to attract Indian students and professionals amid rising US visa competition
stories.summary: In response to escalating H-1B visa fees and competition in the U.S., Japan is launching initiatives to draw Indian talent to its universities and workforce, potentially reshaping skilled migration and international education landscapes.
